mapper.select: SELECT user_id as userId, person_user_id as personId, username as username, status as status FROM user WHERE username = #{username} and password = #{password} and status = 1

SELECT u.person_user_id as userId, p.name as name, p.surname as surname, u.status as status, p.photo as photo, p.email as email FROM person p, user u WHERE p.person_id = u.person_user_id AND u.status = 1

SELECT a.username as username, a.user_id as userId, a.person_user_id as personUserId, b.name as name, b.surname as surname, b.email as email, b.photo as photo, a.status as status, b.cellphone as cellphone FROM user a, person b WHERE a.person_user_id = b.person_id AND a.user_id=#{userId} AND a.status = 1
